definition: a pair who associate with one another, to bring two objects, ideas, or people together
details:
noun
- a pair who associate with one another
= example: a pair who associate with one another
= synonyms: duet
- a pair of people who live together
= example: a pair of people who live together
= synonyms: match
- (physics) something joined by two equal and opposite forces that act along parallel lines
- two items of the same kind
= synonyms: span
- a small indefinite number
= example: a small indefinite number
verb
- to bring two objects, ideas, or people together
= example: to bring two objects, ideas, or people together
= synonyms: mate
- to link together
= example: to link together
= synonyms: couple on, couple up
- to engage in sexual intercourse
= synonyms: mate
- to form a pair or pairs
= synonyms: pair, pair off, partner off
